Thanks, pleasure to be accepted to the club!  Anyways, I'm going to play up=
 Wheelie mostly according to his 'reputation' in the fandom.  So, he'll be =
rhymey and silly, and occasinoally insane!

He doesn't -have- to induce sai=
d insanity in others, but do feel free to play up the normal fandom reactio=
ns of horror to your characters encountering him or other such amusing thin=
gs, or play up the horror stories they might have heard!

I'm definiteyl up=
 for tongue in cheek things about him and other sorts of inanities, so feel=
 free to play off what he is!

> Welcome Wheelie, it is good to see you pos=
ting. Please everyone
> welcome Adam to our little group. I believe he will=
 be a good
> addition.
> 
> I will be away for the rest of the weekend. But=
 I look forward to
> posting on Monday.
> 
> TTFN
> 
> - Preston
>
